author: Tom Ciccotta, Tom Ciccotta
title: Clemson Cracks Down on Social Gatherings After 100 Students Attend Party
description: Officials at Clemson University are cracking down on social gatherings after a group of nearly 100 students held an off-campus gathering over the weekend. Universities and colleges around the countries have been urging students to limit social gatherings to m…
content: Officials at Clemson University are cracking down on social gatherings after a group of nearly 100 students held an off-campus gathering over the weekend. Universities and colleges around the countries have been urging students to limit social gatherings to m… [+1982 chars]
